Name: Events in Europe
Description: Archaeological and Cultural Periods in the Holy Land. These are based on general archaeology and history, rather than Biblical accounts, so diverge from Biblical chronology particularly before the Exodus.
Notes: From Finegan, adding post-1917. Fuzzinesses mine. NB: these seem to assume a late Exodus

Name: Minoan civilisation
Description: Considerable debate as to start date, depending on what you define as "civilisation"!

Name: Volcanic eruption on Thera
Description: Tree-counting date is 1628. Other datings up to 1600 or beyond
